ygData.subject: MM fac :)
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, sorry if part got lost. i killed princess lenya (the real one, not the fake) in highkeep. her faction adjustment was EXTREME. after killing her once, the
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, sorry if part got lost. i killed princess lenya (the real one, not the
fake) in highkeep. her faction adjustment was EXTREME. after killing her
once, the faction changes with all but king tearis thex were so great that
killing her a second time could not affect those factions any more! my MM
faction can still go up by killing bards, but not by killing lenya. so if
nothing else we have learned a bit more about the way faction adjustments work..

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
